frameDefinitions: This frame contains general words for Individuals, i.e. humans.
A Speaker communicates a message stating an Item's membership in a Category, i.e., asserts that the Item has the defining characteristics of the Category.
This frame contains words for individuals, i.e. humans, who are governed by virtue of being registered in a certain Jurisdiction.
A Vehicle moves into position or otherwise changes configuration or state as preparation for normal operation.
This frame concerns transparent nouns that denote Instances of Types of entities or events.
An Entity meets the pre-conditions for participating in an Event.
frameExamples: A man from Phoenix was shot yesterday.
He <t>depicted</t> his involvement as merely peripheral.
The flight for New York finally <t>lifted off</t> from Oakland International with one hundred passengers aboard.

The survey confirmed that management interference in team operations had increased , and <t><fex name='Instance'>instances</fex></t> of management decisions being taken without team consultation had also increased .
Conductor software gives us the hands-on <t>capability</t> to provide updates immediately
listRoleDefinitions: The individual that communicates the message concerning the <fen>Category</fen> of an <fen>Item</fen>.
The class of entities with characteristics that match those of the <fen>Item</fen> according to the portrayal of the <fen>Speaker</fen>.
The entity that the <fen>Speaker</fen> portrays as belonging to a <fen>Category</fen>.
The piece of text in which a <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates their categorization of the <fen>Item</fen>.
The point in time at which the <fen>Speaker</fen> makes a characterization of the <fen>Item</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Speaker</fen> characterizes the <fen>Item</fen>
The vehicle which moves into position for typical operation.
Any expression which describes the location that the <fen>Vehicle</fen> has been stationed at.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Vehicle</fen> gets ready for motion.
The <fen>Place</fen> describes the location where the <fen>Vehicle</fen> prepares for motion.
A thing or episode of a certain <fen>Type</fen>.
The category of thing or event of which an <fen>Instance</fen> is picked out.
The <fen>Entity</fen> whose meeting or falling short of pre-conditions is assessed.
The <fen>Event</fen> that the <fen>Entity</fen> may participate in.
The time at which the <fen>Entity</fen> is capable of the <fen>Event</fen>.
listRoleExamples: However, <fex>'A Brief History of Medicine'</fex> characterizes influenza as the most deadly plague, overall.
The helicopter took off <fex>in the afternoon of October 9th</fex>.
I collected two <t>specimens</t> <fex>of this rare species</fex>.
White House voices doubts about Aristide's ability <fex>to govern</fex>

sourceCandidateSpans.text: Independent Report Critical of L.A.P.D.'s Handling ofScandal
